/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape below. The street, lined with an array of buildings, stretches out into the distance, flanked by trees that add a touch of green to the concrete jungle. Cars and buses, tiny from this high perspective, traverse the road, adding life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with wispy clouds scattered across it. The image is taken from a low angle, making the buildings appear taller and the sky seem vast. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings.
